content.rendered:
A small spa center inside our building to deliver unique and popular spa services for men and women. We offer various types of relaxing massages, facials, exfoliation treatment, exclusive body wraps with different oils.

We offer various types of relaxing massages, facials, exfoliation treatment, exclusive body wraps with different oils. Only luxury spa treatments and only best professionals.

Within specialty massages package we offer several ones you’ll enjoy: a classic massage, a customized massage with a special attention to muscle tension, deep tissue message and a gentle prenatal massage. Some of the luxury facials include: relaxing facial with nourishing vitamins, anti-aging botanical facial, vitamin C facial, a vitamin facial for men and teens as well.

If you are a fan of body wraps, you’ll experience one of the unforgettable spa procedures in your life and we’ve invited medical experts in this area: you’ll enjoy a detox wrap with green tea, vanilla wrap, blossom wrap, and polishing your body with lavender soil.

We’ll do everything to remove stress and anxiety from your body and mind not only during your stay, but for a long time onward! You can order this service on booking confirmation page.

Price: $120 / per adult
